channel.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.iscape-rsps.com][img]http://iscape-rsps.com/thread/head.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://iscape-rsps.com/thread/body.jpg[/img] [url=http://iscape-rsps.com][img]http://iscape-rsps.com/thread/bottomleft.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://iscape-rsps.com/forum][img]http://iscape-rsps.com/thread/bottomright.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=18pt]Open the spoiler below for tons of media![/size] [spoiler] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vx2uDo4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JxwNwBq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ntU54qG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/equygO5.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UsDsWhB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WlNxcBs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/n3MGGAJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bMTp56P.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PbgxwJT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xvAxBrW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/B2ER6r2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SpCLn3W.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mWpileL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SezApKz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oVOyaXb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JQuB0Xk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LJxzhdv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HR1ihfD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uHoihBs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2oWpqx8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Z0PTn6c.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pRMQ61n.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9Mc0lWQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/koKrjre.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/25xTjDA.png[/img] - Working help requesting [img]http://i.imgur.com/HGqmEk0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k2hmj2i.png[/img] Armour bonuses decrease the chance of a hitting monster. [img]http://i.imgur.com/M2pBqm5.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/L74oXig.png[/img] - a new home [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZtJR6K8.png[/img] - working block emotes [img]http://i.imgur.com/p44UJCL.png[/img] - Juggernaut Minigame [img]http://i.imgur.com/3gudoH8.png[/img] - Working wilderness levels [img]http://i.imgur.com/rbGO8Pk.png[/img] - Working castlewars. [img]http://i.imgur.com/RGhuqKn.png[/img] - Working magic NPCs. [img]http://i.imgur.com/FBJVaXk.png[/img] - 100% Vengeance + rebounding damages.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1HLQqyt.png[/img] - Some of the skills at ::skills ( We got almost ALL skills working! ) [img]http://i.imgur.com/x2Q8XsY.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2251BvW.png[/img] - Working wilderness obelisks [img]http://i.imgur.com/4pjnaoB.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8XsnoLu.png[/img]- Section 2 of training area.
Working agility point exchange. 4 tickets per completion of course. [img]http://i.imgur.com/UqF8iyL.png[/img]
Working course [img]http://i.imgur.com/wW2zD6R.png[/img]
Bones on altars. Use the Chaos Altar in level 10 Wilderness for double the XP [img]http://i.imgur.com/JyqUUA0.png[/img]
Fixed Buy X [img]http://i.imgur.com/SG0L6ca.png[/img]
Cooking. Pies, Pizzas, Cakes, Etc coming soon. [img]http://i.imgur.com/a3HgLXA.png[/img]
Drop methods tweaked a bit more. [img]http://i.imgur.com/J34iubi.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/CcVNPc0.png[/img]
Easter ring and Ring of Stone [img]http://i.imgur.com/MwJmDl5.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/1OZ7Pxv.png[/img]
Elemental shield making [img]http://i.imgur.com/9CXq01P.png[/img]
Kickass fishing method with ingenius methods for calling which fish you will catch! [img]http://i.imgur.com/DOtZRl0.png[/img]
Start off crafting with bow stringing [img]http://i.imgur.com/0bo0FC7.png[/img]
Grave markers, with 5 minute timer after death to go get your items. [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZMITwo6.png[/img]
Kaqemeex teaches you about the Herblore skill [img]http://i.imgur.com/i9AGbqJ.png[/img]
Fully working herblore with all potions. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ef3oCTW.png[/img]
Jad Minigame with Tokkul rewards and 63 waves all NPCs correspond to RS2007 spawns for Jad with correct max hits, and ALL animations added. [img]http://i.imgur.com/WKqSM3X.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TdPrPDV.png[/img]
Mining is 100% with working pickaxe differentiation and higher level = faster mining [img]http://i.imgur.com/ex81P2x.png[/img]
Corrected Attack, Block, Death, and Walk animations for 99% (soon 100%) of NPCs in server [img]http://i.imgur.com/grLOGxO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RCHLcxR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fchZC16.png[/img]
Working slayer tasks [img]http://i.imgur.com/3CnTWAS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EbFMo8A.png[/img]
Smelting [img]http://i.imgur.com/qVTgDnL.png[/img]
All smithing requirements from the original Allstar have been fixed (No more Rune Platelegs at level 1) [img]http://i.imgur.com/g1oqyMG.png[/img]
New method for NPC special attacks! (Best part is all defences work for NPC combat and specials. If it's a magic special, your Protect from magic and Magic defence equips will help you, etc) [img]http://i.imgur.com/LVwDCAf.png[/img]
Fully coded Tzhaar Cave with correct drops and animations on each monster. [img]http://i.imgur.com/0bEZGyR.png[/img]
Custom coded whips each have a different effect! Whip of strength hits really high melee, whip of magic has a chance to hit spell damage and grant magic XP, whip of fortune is twice as powerful as ring of wealth, whip of fire sets enemies ablaze dealing fire damage (like poison but more often and more damage), whip of teleportation denies ANY teleblock, and so on.... [img]http://i.imgur.com/QXdcdjS.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/Qtu4Dof.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/OGSezAd.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/6pNkMms.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/74kYxei.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/9RpyuO2.png[/img]
Wilderness Levels are fully functional with bosses located all around the wildy. [img]http://i.imgur.com/M4HRIXh.png[/img]
All trade bugs, drop glitches, cheat client exploits, and blood rune lags are fixed leaving room for awesome telegrab! [img]http://i.imgur.com/YXiugQN.png[/img]
Penance Queen with special attacks! [img]http://i.imgur.com/VO6Ng91.png[/img]
-Working poisoning monsters. (Anything with the word Poison its name will poison you upon dealing damage, 0's will not poison) [img]http://i.imgur.com/LuOo6rz.png[/img]
-Check how much you're worth with our ::worth command (Forget the 2.1B cap, this command supports numbers up to around 500 trillion. [Yes, i'm not joking.]) [img]http://i.imgur.com/cXxIfAo.png[/img]
-My favorite so far, I just finished adding full Gnome tree Drink mixing. Guide works, all fruit cutting works, cooking level reqs work, Blurberry has all the ingredients you need. [img]http://i.imgur.com/8KVNdxm.png[/img]
-Confused where a boss or other creature might be? Not a problem, just use ::whereis (npc name). Supports every NPC in the server, and if you want to know their drops, just use ::data (npc name). I've never seen this on another 317 before in all my 5 years here. [img]http://i.imgur.com/rUWquic.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[size=14pt]TL;DR Join and try it out, reccomend ideas and become part of the server quickly![/size]

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @bananaman50 bananaman50

@bananaman50 wrote:

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:26, topic:550937”]Bump.

Going to play again for a while on a new account. “5stars”[/quote]

Welcome back Wim Str

nichie:

Great server. Couldn’t be happier with the dedication and work that gets put into this everyday. With its 100% uptime it is my favorite allstar i’ve ever played on.

Thanks for the kind words, Nichie!

Let’s get more players on here! We’re adding new bosses and minigames soon!

Read full topic

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

Deemoney:

Been on this server for a cool week, so much content it’s crazy. New updates come out almost every other day. Even more content to come, all of the players on the server are very helpfull, chill people. The developers know what they’re doing. Come get involved in our community/server.

thanks’ Deemoney It means a lot to me that you like my work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Deemoney wrote:

Been on this server for a cool week, so much content it’s crazy. New updates come out almost every other day. Even more content to come, all of the players on the server are very helpfull, chill people. The developers know what they’re doing. Come get involved in our community/server.

item.source: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

Maybe I copied the link wrong! haha sorry, just go to http://www.iscape-rsps.com/forum and click the link to download the client at the top of the categories! Sorry for that!

I’m also going to start posting changelogs on here for you guys to see our progress! Starting with our most recent changes.

4/15:
-Added slayer shop
-Fixed issues with barrows, now working fully with spade on mounds and aggressive npcs with corrected zoning and player following issues.
-Tweaked Slayer XP rates as they were way too slow.
-Added defenders into server.
-Added Ghostify ability to the Lich class. (Temporarily turns you into a ghost dealing magic damage in high quantities against NPCs.)
-Revamped slayer tasks to include monsters all around the server.
-Edited Fire Cape stats.
-Removed Onyx gems from Mining at the Gem Rock. Onyx gems can be obtained purchasing with Tokkul in the shop in Tzhaar Caves.
-Added working Dragon Claws special.
-Edited NPC hit formulas. (Might still be a few bugs to work out.)
-Fixed an issue where players could repeatedly ask for a new slayer task.
-Fixed black dragon block animation.
-Changed home location due to popular demand.

4/16:
-Added a new title system. Unlocking an achievement to its 5th rank unlocks the title associated with that achievement. Check the User Panel in-game for more details.
-Fixed a few bugs with the X and Y coordinates of dig spots for Treasure Trails.
-New Thread design on forums
-Tweaked some XP for skilling.

I’ll edit this when the next update is released!

Read full topic
item.source: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

[quote=“Paradox68, post:10, topic:550937”][quote author=pokemonn link=topic=669850.msg4480060#msg4480060 date=1428970124]
iScape is an Allstar based server, which like most allstar servers lag a little

but that is the only CON this server has in my opinion, for me when i played it felt reviving, it felt fun, and reviving to play. i enjoyed re-living the past RSPS’s by visiting the training areas and the shop areas it was fun and to believe that it is dupe free is just a great achievement, i do believe this server is capable of becoming a success to do the great community and never ending fun with content
[/quote]

Thank you for your positive feedback, but just as a side note, we haven’t had any complaints or issues of lag. The only lag we have is when I have to restart the server for updates/bug fixes.[/quote]

maybe it was just me then! i hope our little feud is behind us now.

Read full topic

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

[quote=“pokemonn, post:9, topic:550937”]iScape is an Allstar based server, which like most allstar servers lag a little

but that is the only CON this server has in my opinion, for me when i played it felt reviving, it felt fun, and reviving to play. i enjoyed re-living the past RSPS’s by visiting the training areas and the shop areas it was fun and to believe that it is dupe free is just a great achievement, i do believe this server is capable of becoming a success to do the great community and never ending fun with content[/quote]

Thank you for your positive feedback, but just as a side note, we haven’t had any complaints or issues of lag. The only lag we have is when I have to restart the server for updates/bug fixes.

sertan8:

Thank you Sertan. There aren’t many classic servers alive anymore, and all I can think is “This is why RSPS was made in the first place! Why do people chase after the same updates that Jagex screwed up on?”

item.title: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
item.dc:creator: @Paradox68 Paradox68
item.description:
@Paradox68 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Yes it looks very good, it shows that Allstars can be great if in the right hands

Soulcist:

Looks to be full of content, nice job. I like the idea of what’s going for this one and what not. Keep it up and wish for the best in terms of development! Good job again.

Thank you so much guys. We worked for several months on the server but only yesterday decided to bring it back. In two days we’ve gotten so much progress. We have a perfect website at
http://www.iscape-rsps.com and we now have IPBoards with probably the sexiest theme ever. I hope you decide to give us a try!

Read full topic
item.source: iScape is back! The most stable, lag-free, dupe-free Allstar ever!
